Html:
Hello!

I'm using this marvellous class but I have a little problem. I need to count the number of rows of a file Excel. How I can do it? Which is the method I have to use?

Thank you very much
Gianluca

Maybe getHighestRow() will come in handy?

Example:

$highestRow = $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getHighestRow();
